section.p: He tells you his sob story whether you want to hear it or not.

‘I am an expert thief, if an indifferent fighter, but the old established burglars’ clans will not allow me to ply my trade in the towns. Thus I’ve had to try my luck as a highwayman, and I’m just not cut out for it!’

‘Well, thanks anyway for sparing my life,’ he says. ‘In return let me give you this advice. The bridge over the Chu River is a favourite place for the Black Swan sisters to waylay travellers. Don’t trust them an inch!’
